description: Chief Secretariate Sabaragamuwa Province - Mr. H. P. C. K. Jayawandala, Chairman of the Mawanella Pradeshiya Sabha Vacated Office from 31.12.2021 and delegated powers to the Vice Chairman from 31.12.2021, Mawanella Praeshiya Sabha - Mr. C. G. Wimalasena Chairman of the Balangoda Urban Council vacated office from 14.01.2022 and delegated powers to the Vice Chairman from 14.01.2022, Balangoda Urban Council (S only)
